author: Anthony Bond
title: Jerusalem truck attack: Horrifying footage shows moment terrorist ploughs truck into Israeli soldiers killing 4
text:
Get daily   
This horrifying footage shows the moment a terrorist rammed his truck into a group of Israeli soldiers killing four and injuring at least 15. 
A large group of soldiers can be seen waiting on the promenade in the Armon Hanatziv neighborhood . 
Suddenly, out of nowhere, the truck drives straight through the group at high speed. 
Other soldiers scatter in horror as the driver - thought to be a Palestinian - reverses back and forward over his victims. 
Soldiers began firing at the vehicle and killed the driver. Pictures show bullet holes in the windscreen. 
The truck drove into pedestrians in the Armon Hanatziv neighborhood in a suspected terror attack. The truck can be seen driving towards the soldiers (Photo: Copyright unknown) Footage shows the moment of the truck attack (Photo: Copyright unknown) 
About 15 people are thought to have been injured with at least four thought to have died. 
Witnesses say the attacker drove his truck "back and forward" over the victims as they lay on the floor. 
Police have said the truck driver was “neutralized” . It is believed over soldiers at the scene shot him dead. At least four people are thought to have been killed (Photo: REUTERS) The truck rammed into a group of pedestrians (Photo: AFP) 
Victims were reportedly trapped underneath the truck, the Times of Israel reported. 
A crane was brought in to lift the vehicle of the victims. 
Pictures from the scene show bullet holes in the windscreen of the vehicle after police attempted to stop the driver. Bullet holes can be seen in the windscreen of the truck (Photo: Copyright Unknown) 
Police say the truck veered from its course and rammed into people getting off a bus. 
An Israeli bus driver who witnessed the incident said on the radio the truck ploughed into a group of soldiers, and that they fired on the driver, who reversed direction and ran over them again. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
